snippet: The detentions came amid a series of raids aimed at dismantling a recruitment and transportation network for would-be fighters wanting to reach Syria.
abstract: French authorities arrest 10 people in series of raids aimed at dismantling recruitment and transportation network for would-be jihadists who want to travel to Syria to join groups like Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The detentions came amid a series of raids aimed at dismantling a recruitment and transportation network for would-be fighters wanting to reach Syria.

headline.main: France Arrests 10 People in Suspected Jihadist Network

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
